description:
When I heard that adorable Gerin wanted to try doing porn AND he was an eager bottom, I was thrilled to have him come in for a solo and perhaps start mixing him in with some of the straight boys.
Gerin is definitely a power bottom, and I think his motto is, "The bigger the better!"
Well, I certainly have a lot of well-endowed dudes right now, that could, uh, fill his need.
He's young and has "twink" written all over him. He is a gymnast, so I am hoping he will be very flexible and mount some poles in creative ways.
When I say he is adorable, I really mean it. He is as cute as can be. He even does this little bootie shake after he takes off his shirt that is adorable.
So for all you Tops looking for an eager bottom to take it, I think Gerin will be a great team player...or at least willing to take one (or two) for the team!
title: Gerin - Solo
